templates.name: Initial Outreach
templates.subject: Quick question about [Company]
templates.body:
Hi [Name],

I came across [Company] and was impressed by [specific detail].

I wanted to reach out because [reason].

Would you be open to a quick chat?

Best,
[Your Name]

templates.name: Follow Up
templates.subject: Following up - [Previous Subject]
templates.body:
Hi [Name],

I wanted to follow up on my previous message. I know you're busy, so I'll keep this brief.

[Value proposition]

Let me know if you'd like to discuss further.

Best,
[Your Name]

templates.name: Value Proposition
templates.subject: How we can help [Company]
templates.body:
Hi [Name],

I specialize in helping companies like [Company] with [specific service].

Here's what we can do:
- [Benefit 1]
- [Benefit 2]
- [Benefit 3]

Interested in learning more?

Best,
[Your Name]
